titleStmt.title: His Maiesties resolution concerning the setting up of his standard at Nottingham on Monday next signified to both Houses of Parliament, August 17 : wherein is likewise declared the number of His Majesties army both of horse and foot : together with four propositions presented to the House of Commons from the Gentry of Yorkeshire upon Wednesday being the 17 day of this instant month of August, 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
